title: As a Club, I want Signing Bonus returned through the MJC API
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "EBIS Link" screen from left nav
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to query by PlayerID
AND user should be able to query by ContractID
AND user should be able to query by Last Changed Datestamp Range
AND fields listed on the linked wiki under Signing Bonus section should be added to the API
AND data in the response must exactly match data on the UI in the Signing Bonus section
AND response should be returned under 2 seconds

title: As a BOC User, I want to Navigate to and View the Central Tender Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Central Tender under Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Central Tender Widget should load
AND "Central Tender" tab should be placed in alphabetical order on the dashboard and submenu of Major Contracts
AND Browser tab text should say "Central Tender" 
AND layout should match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Default Sort is Alpha on Org
AND Status column will be a hyperlink to the Org's Tender Sheet

NOTE: The Central Tender Widget is a BOC only widget.
Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_widget

title: As a User, I want to View the Salary Info Modal for a Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Central Tender Utility in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Salary Info button
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch the Salary Info Modal
AND The layout of the modal will match the provided wireframe
AND The fields will match the provided data discovery
AND If the Tender Utility is in view mode when the modal is opened, the modal will be in view mode
AND If the Tender Utility is in edit mode when the modal is opened, the modal will be in edit mode
AND Clicking the Close button or the 'X' will close the modal
Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: Affiliate Profiles Permissions - Pro Player BOC Admin
custom_preconds:
Wireframes:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=major_league_affiliate_profile
Data Discoveries:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJ+Affiliate+Profiles+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC admin
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with the Affiliates Profiles Widget or an Affiliate Profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view Affiliate Profiles Widget
AND user should be able to view Affiliate Profiles
AND user should be able to update Affiliate Profiles
AND user should be able to create New Profiles

title: Affiliate Profiles Permissions - Pro Player BOC Viewer
custom_preconds:
Wireframes:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=major_league_affiliate_profile
Data Discoveries:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJ+Affiliate+Profiles+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Viewer
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with the Affiliates Profiles Widget or an Affiliate Profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view Affiliate Profiles Widget
AND user should be able to view Affiliate Profiles
BUT user should not be able to make any updates

title: As a User, I don't want renamed Club Effective Dates to overlap with previous versions of the club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club profile has been renamed before
AND user is viewing the new club's profile in edit mode
custom_steps:
WHEN start date for new club overlaps with end date for previous version of club
AND user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a check against effective dates to make sure the current dates are not overlapping with previous versions of the club
AND if the check fails, system should return an error message:
"Title: Invalid Effective Date
Body: New effective dates can not be earlier than the end date of a previous version of the club
Hint: You need to modify the effective date so it is after the prior version's end date"

title: As a User, I want to be warned if there is a Club with an empty roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in Enter Reaffiliations screen
AND there is a Club with an empty roster
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Continue' on Enter Reaffiliations screen
custom_expected:
THEN an 'Empty Roster Detected' warning modal will appear (depicted in the provided wireframe)
AND The Inactive radio button will be selected by default
AND If Inactive button is selected when Continue is clicked, the club will be end-dated and made inactive when the reafilliation is performed, and the user will be taken to the Reaffiliation Details modal
Or if Active button is selected when Continue is clicked, no action will be taken on the club when the reafilliation is performed,  and the user will be taken to the Reaffiliation Details modal
AND Clicking the Back button will close the modal

title: As a User, I want to perform the Reaffiliation
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user in Reaffiliation Details modal
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Perform Reaffiliation button
custom_expected:
THEN system will perform the reaffiliation, processing each row separately, as described in Rule 4 of the provided rules document
AND when the reaffiliation is complete, a blue success notification will be displayed, as depicted in the provided wireframe
AND empty clubs that were marked as Active or Inactive Clubs earlier will have the necessary actions taken

Wire:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_reaffiliation

title: As a User, I want to changing a Club name to end date the existing Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user in Reaffiliation Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user Changes the club name in New Club field
custom_expected: THEN changing the name will end date the existing club and use the entered effective date for the new club

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Official Payroll Comparison Report
custom_preconds:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Report+Layouts

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Population%2C+Logic%2C+and+Sort+Considerations

Report Consolidations and Custom Groups: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Consolidations+and+Custom+Groups

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Prompts

GIVEN a user is logged in as club or boc
AND user has navigated to Reporting Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks link for Official Payroll Comparison Report
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: As a User, I want to run the Affiliate Inquiry Report
custom_preconds:
Report Layout:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Affiliate+Inquiry+Report+Layout

Report Details:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Affiliate+Inquiry+Report+Details

Population, Logic, and Sorting:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Affiliate+Inquiry+Report+Population%2C+Logic%2C+and+Sort+Considerations

Prompts:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Affiliate+Inquiry+Report+Prompts

GIVEN a user is logged in as club or boc
AND user has navigated to Reporting Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks link for Affiliate Inquiry Report
custom_expected:
THEN system should display prompts matching wiki documentation
AND selecting prompts and clicking ok should generate the Affiliate Inquiry Report matching wiki report layout and details

title: As a user I want deleting an investigation in EBIS to send a deleted result to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN an investigation has previously been created in EBIS and sent to LARI
custom_steps: WHEN the Investigation is deleted in EBIS
custom_expected:
THEN a result of "DEL" should be sent via the API to LARI to mark the investigation deleted
AND once the investigation has been deleted, it should be considered completed so that another investigation can be successfully sent to LARI for the same player

title: Central Tender Utility Permissions - BOC MJ Contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC admin or BOC basic user
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with Winter League Requests
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Admin users should be able to View, Update, Submit, Verify, Freeze and  Finalize Central Tender list
BUT BOC Basic Users should only be able to View Central Tender list

title: Central Tender Utility Permissions - Club MJ Contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as club basic or club admin user
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with a Winter League Request
custom_expected:
THEN Club Admin users should be able to View, Update and Submit Central Tender list
BUT Club Basic users should only be able to View Central Tender list

title: As a User, I want to easily see if tender amounts are missing or below the minimum
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Salary info modal in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN MJ or MN tender amount is set below the minimum tender amount for Tendered player
custom_expected:
THEN the minimum tender amount should be displayed in bold red text
AND the text box for the violating tender amount should be outlined in red
NOTE: This is a front-end validation and should be visible in both edit mode and view mode, prior to the user saving

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a User, I want to easily see if prior year salary values have been modified
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in salary info modal
custom_steps: WHEN user manual any of the 6 prior year salary columns (tender year minus 1 or tender year minus 2)
custom_expected:
THEN the text should appear in orange font
AND The orange font should be visible in both edit and view mode

Wire:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=salary_info

title: As a BOC User, I want to see the Finalize button on the Central Tender Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user logs in
AND All 30 Orgs' Tender Sheets have a status of Verified on CT widget
AND The Tender Utility is Frozen
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Central Tender Widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "Finalize" button 

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=central_tender_widget

title: Replace  Club Nickname with Club Shortname throughout system
custom_preconds: GIVEN system has been updated to replace Nickname with Shortname
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to one of the following places in EBIS:
 - Pending Approval Widget
 - Contract History Widget
 - Roster Number Breakdown Report
 - Potential MN Free Agents Report
custom_expected:
THEN Club Shortname should display instead of Club Nickname
AND this field should also be removed from affiliate profiles and the database so its not used in the future
